text:
Hi everyone,
We need to perform Browser automation of HubSpot login functionality including 2FA. Not sure how to bypass  2FA or call any API to authenticate instead of using messages from devices.
Appreciate your help.

Good morning! Not sure this is the best place to report an issue with the Tracking code API.
The documentation (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/tracking-code>) refers to using `window._hsq`, but that seems to have stopped working over the weekend.
I’ve checked the tracking code script that’s included in our `index.html`, and indeed, it now refers to `window._hsp` instead.
It looks like this could be a typo…

Has anyone experienced a similar thing?
"Is there a way to fetch call logs or call history from HubSpot's CRM using their API? If so, could you provide some documentation or guidance on how to achieve this?"
<@U05DQ8B599C> I think this is the part of the API that you’re looking for: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/calls>

The link  you provided is attempting to use the HubSpot API to fetch calls data. However, based on the available API documentation, there is no specific endpoint for retrieving calls data in HubSpot.
The link you shared is using the `basic_api.get_page()` method, which suggests it is trying to fetch a page of calls data. However, since the calls endpoint is not available, it is likely to result in an exception.

The link  you provided is attempting to use the HubSpot API to fetch calls data. However, based on the available API documentation, there is no specific endpoint for retrieving calls data in HubSpot.
The link you shared is using the `basic_api.get_page()` method, which suggests it is trying to fetch a page of calls data. However, since the calls endpoint is not available, it is likely to result in an exception.

The link I shared describes the endpoints to interact with Calls in HubSpot through the REST API, so I’m not sure where you’re getting `basic_api.get_page()` from. And I believe GET*`/crm/v3/objects/calls`* would give you a call log, if you get all the pages one after the other.
You can also use the search if listing all calls is too much.
Is this not what you call a “specific endpoint for retrieving calls data”?
Hey guys. is there a specific channel for posting questions around building a 100% custom designed landing pages and etc ?

I think it depends a bit on the questions.
HubL is used a lot for this, but some questions might fall into "modules".

If its a general question about the Theming -> themes

Just trying to get an idea of best way to start with building custom designed landing pages.

What are some of the ways you can do that ?

How are your developer abilities?
If you are feeling comfortable around Web development I would suggest to start here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate>
Also HubSpot Academy has free courses on developing with their CMS

i’m a developer myself - would this approach a common way people go for ?

• Choose a basic template
• Remove existing modules, sections that comes with template
• Import your custom modules that you create to build a sections

Hey, I'm seeing an issue where we have some forms that include CTAs in the thank-you text, which are now breaking. It looks like it breaks the embed JS at the CTA embed. I believe these pages have been set up like this for a few months at least, and this is a recent thing. Is anyone else seeing this?
The `</script>` added by the CTA embed code looks like it's not getting escaped
I think this was fixed! Thanks, whoever did this!

Hi.
I got a question about associating UTK’s with contacts.
Im using python SDK to creating contacts.
I got UTK’s for some of them.
May be some one know, can i somehow associate it with contact via SDK?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>
I think passing in the utk here may be the only way

the problem that it is just API.
I dont want to mix sdk and api in one app
time to ditch the sdk :stuck_out_tongue:
When did the unique values in the domain field for HubSpot companies change?
This throws off things like using the idProperty and other stuff like that.
Docs still say it's a unique identifier:
the `basic_api.get_page` is from the example code listed in the documentation
Hello guys  it seems one of my input fields is suddenly locked , any idea what may be happening?
Any idea what could have caused this?
amd how I can change this?
`disabled` makes the input disabled, can we get some context? Was this HubSpot generated code or custom code?

So what you would do if you use an existing Theme is that you create a child-theme of that where you can add more custom modules, sections etc. You wont be able to get rid of the modules that are part of the theme but you can add your own to adjust the page to your needs.

That being said I have mainly built my own themes as this gives more control over the result.
